messages.message: Yep @Ashish's method worked for me (tho I wasn't seeing kernel error but was getting 400 on entire page). is this something we are fixing at some point?
@mimi are you observing any notebook problems?

i was getting 400 on .ipynb (while other file types were fine) before trying your method of logging out and clearing cookies (hard refresh didn't work). from above, it sounds like there's some cookie bug where we use longer session cookies beyond what's supported for notebook -- i wasn't sure if it is a bug or intended design, do you know?
I think I have seen that peculiarity in the past. I think it has to be the cookie size in nginx (one of our web servers).
Though the cookie size doesn't get large for every user.
